name: Hypercent
description: Hypercent- Where verified projects launch on Kadena, the true home of DeFI. We are an IDO and NFT launchpad on the Kadena blockchain, Locking $HYPE allows users to access the verified sales that we hold on our launchpad. Our raise ended on 22 March 2022, we raised 2mil $ worth of KDA from 1660 KYC'ed users, on our own launchpad. The total number of holders we have right now sits at 2820.
